Figure 2 illustrates the three texts’ differing elaborations of normativity on the micro and meso-level. The brackets in Fig. 2 illustrate the complementarity of the three texts related to the different foci on specific entities. While the UN documents marginalize the role of individuals, they formulate a pronounced regulation of national contributions to SD. Respectively the Encyclical marginalizes national policy matters and introduces a strong account of individual contributions to social concerns in SD.Fig. 2
